_header: Wellaway such went well to lead good life and bliss underfo

CamPem32.Transcription:
Welaway swych wenet wel to lede god lyf and blis vnderfoand te ded
                    lyd him to stranglen wyd inne hyse scho
CamPem32.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Kleinere mittelenglische texte.” 
             Anglia
         42 (1918): 145-224; 43 (1919): 191: 147.
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Pembroke
                College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1905: 35.
